info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 1:00AM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Grant, western Luna and eastern Hidalgo Counties through 130 AM MDT... At 100 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles east of Hachita, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hachita and Hachita Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
